CustomField.description: List of Completed Sections based on the completion dates in each section.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Compensation_Completed_Date__c) , "", "Compensation"&BR()) & IF( ISBLANK( Employee_Development_Completed_Date__c ) , "", "Employee Development"&BR()) & IF( ISBLANK( Employee_Engagement_Completed_Date__c ) , "", "Employee Engagement"&BR()) & IF( ISBLANK( Employee_Retention_Completed_Date__c ) , "", "Employee Retention"&BR()) & IF( ISBLANK( Leadership_Completed_Date__c ) , "", "Leadership"&BR()) & IF( ISBLANK( Org_Communication_Completed_Date__c ) , "", "Organizational Communication"&BR()) & IF( ISBLANK( Succession_Planning_Completed_Date__c ) , "", "Succession Planning"&BR())
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List of Completed Sections based on the completion dates in each section.
CustomField.label: Sections Completed
